sections.content:
Question:
Does RA2 Series support IEC60730/60335?
Answer:
RA2 Series provides Application note and self test library how to use flexible sample software routines to assist with compliance with IEC60730 class B safety standards
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
